question.text: Any violation of university policies, including the Child Protection Policy, may be met by the following consequences:
question.option: Denied permission to continue operation at the university

question.text: Retaliation against anyone acting in good faith who has reported inappropriate conduct / child abuse is in violation of this policy. Which of the following acts are considered a retaliatory action?
question.option: employment actions affecting salary, promotion, job duties, work schedules and/or work locations
actions negatively impacting a studentâ€™s academic record or progress
any action affecting the campus environment, including harassment and intimidation
